item.title: Has Tico been warned yet?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Just to clarify, there is a difference:

[quote=“Tico, post:40, topic:333747”][quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=430151.msg3171129#msg3171129 date=1270445974]
They should use there own music in the next trailer and not use a shitty eminem song like IW
[/quote]

I’m sorry, but you’re fucking retarded. Clearly that song is legit.[/quote]

This post has flame, but it is not only flame, it still adds something to the discussion.

[quote=“Unhandled, post:13, topic:330146”][quote author=MistaBigBoss link=topic=426523.msg3166646#msg3166646 date=1270076383]
lol when i red ur comment in my head, that guy that said thisis sparta said this is sparty like the way he said it in the movie with all the shit coming out of his mouth all in my fucking head, i sounds retarded just ignore me
[/quote]
don’t post then you fucking idiot.[/quote]

This post is only flame, it adds nothing and accomplishes nothing.

Either way though, flaming is against the rules.

Read full topic

item.title: Has Tico been warned yet?

They should use there own music in the next trailer and not use a shitty eminem song like IW
[/quote]

I’m sorry, but you’re fucking retarded. Clearly that song is legit.[/quote]
srs post

I believe he should be warned for his behavior in that topic, since apparently all of MITB is little girls and can’t take a small amount of criticism or fun flaming. Everyone must be warned. Moderators, feel free to use the template provided by c|p in that post to warn him.
